mapper.select: SELECT a.TABLE_NAME, b.TABLE_COMMENT, a.COLUMN_NAME, a.DATA_TYPE, a.COLUMN_TYPE, a.COLUMN_COMMENT FROM information_schema.`COLUMNS` a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.TABLE_NAME, a.TABLE_COMMENT FROM information_schema.TABLES a WHERE a.TABLE_SCHEMA = (SELECT DATABASE())) b ON b.table_name = a.table_name WHERE a.TABLE_SCHEMA = (SELECT DATABASE()) ORDER BY a.TABLE_NAME, a.ORDINAL_POSITION
